.. default-domain:: c

********
Builtins
********

Various builtin types used in the program

.. type:: uint

A 32-bit unsigned integer. Defined by

``typedef unsigned int uint``

.. type:: uint8_t

A 8-bit (octet) unsigned integer. Often used to represent raw bytes. Defined by 

``typedef unsigned char uint8_t``

.. type:: uint64_t

A 64-bit unsigned integer. Typically defined by

``typedef unsigned long long uint64_t``
